messages.subject: Balance
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/13/02 8:16:20 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/13/02 8:16:20 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Wrong again, that would be someone else on this group... guess who >>

If this has the meaning implied that I think it does, that was really rude.
It's funny how the people getting questioned about their philosophies take it
as an attack when no such thing was done, but they turn around and make it a
personal attack on the person that did the questioning.
Asking why you believe something or saying "that's not our experience" is not
an attack.
Calling someone names is.

Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
